import React, { useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Surahs() { const [Data, setData] = useState({}); var index = []; var index2 = []; var index3 = []; for (var i = 0; i <= 114; i++) { if(i<4){ index.push(i); } if(i >=4 && i<8){ index2.push(i); } // if(8 { async function fetchData() { const res = await fetch("http://104.238.102.6/~yildirim/quran.com/api/chapters/en"); res.json().then(res => setData(res)) } fetchData(); }); return (
